name: Overgrown (itch) (Drawlii)
description:
"What could have happened here...?"

Olive, a young girl who's fed up with her life decides to run off and explore a mysterious, abandoned town.


Overgrown is a game with a focus on environment, atmosphere and story.  Piece together the history of this odd town by finding items and trinkets left by the past residents.

This game was completed over the course of a few months for my degree, so it's a little barebones, but I put a lot of love and effort in, so I hope you enjoy it!
